subject: Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The race was halted by a fiery explosion when Juan Pablo Montoya’s No. 42 car slammed into a jet drier on the famed track.
snippet: The race was halted by a fiery explosion when Juan Pablo Montoya’s No. 42 car slammed into a jet drier on the famed track.
